ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The only thing I didn t like about the Pretenders was that they only moved at the shoulder. they wouldve been more oopular if they were a little bigger and

The only thing I didn't like about the Pretenders was that they only 
moved at the shoulder. they wouldve been more oopular if they were a 
little bigger and moved at the elbows, hips, knees, and maybe even 
the neck.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Yeah, they need a storage spot for their weapons. I don't know, the 
pretenders were just never that great to me, because they had those 
shells...
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: cyberwolf4@p... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 11:32 PM
>   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
>   Hey I liked the Pretenders. I have the 1st twelve, Jazz, 
Grimlock, 
>   Bumblebee, the two decepticon animals, Bludgeon and ThunderWing. 
>   TWings my fav. and the headmasters all had places for thier heads 
>   inside. The weapons are what always got mixxed up and lost on 
mine.
> 
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > Yeah, we can only hope that G1 makes it back okay. We need a
